categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode I Adventures novels

nodes.text: Episode I Adventures 8: Trouble on Tatooine
Episode I Adventures 8: Trouble on Tatooine was the eighth installment of Star Wars Episode I Adventures.
Anakin Skywalker and his friends are in big trouble. Slave hunters are after them. The fate of the Ghostling children rests in their hands. And they have only one chance to find freedom.
